wikipedia_page.main: Jordan Stewart (born 31 March 1995) is a Northern Irish professional footballer who plays for NIFL Premiership side Linfield. He has also been called up for the Northern Ireland U21s. Stewart can play as both a midfielder and as a centre forward.
